name: symptomatic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something bad is symptomatic of something else, it is caused by the other thing and is proof that it exists: Jealousy within a relationship is usually symptomatic of low self-esteem in one of the partners.
medical
  specialized showing symptoms of a particular disease: symptomatic AIDS patients symptomatic influenza A doctor who had treated an Ebola patient may have been symptomatic when he boarded the plane.
